Room.Name: Ashton River Road/Phexton Bridge
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the northeast end of the Phexton Bridge.
Room.LongDescription: This is the eastern end of the Ashton River Road. A sign post indicates that the road to the north leads to the elven city of Hafnia, while the road to the south leads to the castle of Prince Rutger. Both roads lead higher into the mountains. Over the bridge to the west is a road that leads down out of the mountains.
